DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator aim assess clinical neurophysiological effect non-invasive brain stimulation technique - transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) - cortical plasticity motor learn child cerebral palsy . Investigators use different assessment technique , transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) kinematics ( sensor ) measure change trial .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation ( tDCS ) Motor Learning Children With Cerebral Palsy ( CP )
DOC.criteria: Age participant must 8 18 year old . Diagnosis spastic mixed CP distribution diplegia and/or hemiplegia form . Gross Motor Function Classification System Cerebral Palsy ( GMFCS ) level II III . Manual Ability Classification System Children CP ( MACS ) level II IV . Ability cooperate follow direction . Muscle tone reduction therapy past 3 month prior study onset . Upper limb orthopedic surgery past 3 month prior study onset . Any form therapy procedure involve motor neuron junction inhibition ; either biochemical and/or mechanical denervation , past 3 month prior study onset . History convulsive disorder past 2 year prior study onset . Current use carbamazepine anticonvulsive therapy . Presence ventriculoperitoneal shunt .
